text: Aey eman walon! Tum per maqtoolon ka qisass lena farz kiya gaya hai aazad aazad kay badlay ghulam ghulam kay badlay aurat aurat kay badlay. Haan jiss kissi ko uss kay bhai kay badlay moafi dey di jaye ussay bhalaee ki ittaba kerni chahaiye aur aasani kay sath deeyat ada kerni chahaiye. Tumharay rab ki taraf say yeh takhfeef aur rehmat hai iss kay baad bhi jo sirkashi keray ussay dard naak azab hoga
